forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 18C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 64F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 57F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain ending in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending early. Remaining cloudy. High 61F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 13C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near 55F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 62F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low around 55F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low around 10C. S winds at 15 to 30 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low near 50F. S winds at 10 to 20 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
